media.headline: Guerra gets Gonzalez swinging
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Guerra fans Gonzalez in 1st
media.bigblurb: Junior Guerra gets out of the top of the 1st inning with a swinging strikeout of Carlos Gonzalez

media.headline: Gray strikes out Villar
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Gray gets Villar looking in 1st
media.bigblurb: Jon Gray started the new campaign off with a punch out of Jonathan Villar

media.headline: Guerra tosses his first pitch
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Guerra's first pitch of 2017
media.bigblurb: Junior Guerra's first pitch of the new season goes for a ball on Charlie Blackmon in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Reynolds' two-run homer
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds belts a two-run shot to left field
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds drives a pitch over the left field wall for a two-run home run in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Fan grabs errant bat
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Fan comes up with bat after strikeout
media.bigblurb: A little boy comes away with a bat after Junior Guerra gets Tony Wolters swinging on a strikeout to end the top half of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Guerra hobbles off after bunt
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Guerra leaves game after executing sac bunt
media.bigblurb: Junior Guerra lays down a sacrifice bunt, but has to get helped off the field in the bottom of the 3rd inning and later exits the game

media.headline: Parra's RBI single
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Parra goes up the middle for an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Gerardo Parra drives a pitch back up the middle to single in Nolan Arenado in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Rockies lineup introduced
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Rockies lineup is introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The Rockies' starting lineup is introduced at Miller Park prior to the club's Opening Day showdown against the Brewers

media.headline: 2017 Brewers lineup introduced
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Brewers lineup is introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The 2017 Brewers lineup is introduced to the home crowd at Miller Park prior to the team's Opening Day tilt against the Rockies

media.headline: Villar's two-RBI double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Villar knocks in two on double up the middle
media.bigblurb: Jonathan Villar brings in the Brewers' first two runs of the season on a double to center field in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Broxton pops on Snapchat Specs
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Broxton wears Snapchat Spectacles in opener
media.bigblurb: Brewers outfielder Keon Broxton walks around with Snapchat Spectacles during his introduction on Opening Day

media.headline: Thames' two-run double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Thames ties the game with a two-run double
media.bigblurb: Eric Thames sends a two-run double to right field to even the score in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Attanasio sings national anthem
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Attanasio performs the national anthem
media.bigblurb: Mike Attanasio performs the national anthem at Miller Park prior to the Brewers' Opening Day game against the Rockies

media.headline: Shaw's go-ahead RBI double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Shaw doubles in Thames in the 5th
media.bigblurb: Travis Shaw laces a double to center field, scoring Eric Thames to take the lead in the bottom of the 5th

media.headline: Blackmon's leaping grab
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Blackmon makes leaping catch at the wall
media.bigblurb: Charlie Blackmon hangs on to the ball after making a leaping catch against the center-field wall in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Blackmon brings in Reynolds
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds scores on fielder's choice
media.bigblurb: Charlie Blackmon reaches on a fielder's choice, scoring Mark Reynolds to even the score in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Wolters' run gives Rockies lead
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Wolters scores on botched throw to second
media.bigblurb: Tony Wolters takes home plate after a botched throw to second base on a Charlie Blackmon steal in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Ottavino's inning-ending K
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Ottavino gets Perez swinging to escape jam
media.bigblurb: Adam Ottavino gets Hernan Perez swinging to strike out the side and get out of a jam in the bottom of the 8th inning

media.headline: Amarista's RBI double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Amarista drives in a run on pinch-hit double
media.bigblurb: Alexi Amarista flares a pinch-hit double to left field, scoring Tony Wolters to extend the lead in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Story scores on fielder's choice
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds brings in Story on fielder's choice
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds beats out the throw to first base on an attempted double play, scoring Trevor Story in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Guerra picks off Blackmon
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Guerra escapes the 3rd with a pickoff
media.bigblurb: Junior Guerra catches Charlie Blackmon leaning on a pickoff at second base to end the top half of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Rockies turn two to end the 7th
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Wolters throws out Braun to turn two
media.bigblurb: Tony Wolters throws out Ryan Braun attempting to steal after Mike Dunn strikes out Travis Shaw for a double play to end the 7th inning

media.headline: Arcia's strong throw to home
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arcia throws out a runner at home in the 7th
media.bigblurb: Orlando Arcia takes a cut-off from Ryan Braun before throwing out Gerardo Parra at home plate in the top of the 7th

media.headline: Bandy's single in the 5th
media.blurb: MIL@COL: Bandy gets his first hit with the Brewers
media.bigblurb: Jett Bandy singled to center fielder for his first hit with the Brewers in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Must C: Charlie gets a snow cone
media.blurb: Must C Catch: Blackmon makes great snow cone catch
media.bigblurb: Charlie Blackmon jumps at the track in deep center field and just hangs onto the ball after knocking into the wall

media.headline: Arenado's dive starts DP
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arenado's dive begins DP, call confirmed
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado dives and fields a sharp grounder off Ryan Braun's bat to begin the game-ending double play and the call is confirmed

media.headline: Brewers score five in the 5th
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Brewers score five runs in the 5th inning
media.bigblurb: The Brewers erase a four-run deficit with five runs scored in the 5th inning, including three run-scoring doubles

media.headline: Holland, Arenado end the game
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Holland earns save on Arenado's great DP
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado's diving stop starts the game-ending double play as Greg Holland records his first save with the Rockies

media.headline: Counsell on Opening Day loss
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Counsell on Guerra's injury and outing
media.bigblurb: Counsell talks about the devastating injury to Junior Guerra, what his team must do to persevere and how competitive the game was

media.headline: Recap: COL 7, MIL 5
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Reynolds powers Rockies to Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Mark Reynolds drove in three runs, including a two-run homer, while the Rockies pitchers combined for 14 strikeouts

media.headline: Guerra on right calf injury
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Guerra discusses his right calf injury
media.bigblurb: Junior Guerra talks about his right calf injury that forced him out of the game in the 3rd inning on a sacrifice bunt

media.headline: Counsell on Guerra injury
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Counsell on Geurra's calf injury
media.bigblurb: Craig Counsell talks about Junior Guerra's right calf strain that caused him to depart the game in the 3rd inning after a sacrifice bunt

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: COL@MIL
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: COL@MIL
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: COL@MIL

media.headline: Black on Opening Day win
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Black pleased with offense in 7-5 win
media.bigblurb: Bud Black discusses the Rockies impressive showing of offense in a 7-5 Opening Day win over the Brewers
